entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:10 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 9:10 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
